verbs.description: [ARG1: The move] [V: comes] [ARGM-TMP: on the same day that the head of the IBWC Edward Drusina stepped down at the request of the Trump administration] , [ARGM-ADV: according to agency officials . Principal Engineer Jose Nuñez will step in as acting commissioner] .

The move comes on [ARGM-TMP: the same day] [R-ARGM-TMP: that] [ARG0: the head of the IBWC Edward Drusina] [V: stepped] down [ARGM-CAU: at the request of the Trump administration] , according to agency officials . Principal Engineer Jose Nuñez will step in as acting commissioner .

The move comes on the same day that the head of the IBWC Edward Drusina stepped down at the request of the Trump administration , according to agency officials . Principal Engineer Jose Nuñez will step in as [V: acting] [ARG1: commissioner] .
